name: Holiday Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Stephanie Wiebe Meismer
summary: My guests liked this pumpkin cheesecake so much I didn't get to taste it!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) jar caramel sauce, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine graham cracker crumbs, butter, pecans, and cinnamon in a bowl
Pat into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan
Beat cream cheese, sugar, cornstarch, and vanilla extract together in a mixing bowl until fluffy
Add eggs and egg yolks all at once; beat just until combined
Carefully fold in pumpkin and heavy cream, marbling but not mixing completely
Pour batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until center appears nearly set when shaken, 35 to 40 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before chilling in a refrigerator 8 hours to overnight
Drizzle caramel sauce over each serving
